content: scrunchies are making a comeback smiley this pattern is great for leftovers as it only requires approx 50m of yarn super easy to knit and makes an awesome as well as quick gift as well the pattern is adaptable to any size/length hair tie you have - all you need is your gauge and the length your hair tie stretches to in order to calculate the amount of stitches you will need to cast on the pattern was written for a hair tie that is 6 5cm/2 55 in diameter and stretches to 19cm/7 5 38cm/15 circumference without any metal connectors see picture
